EmailTemplate.name: Sharmin test RTW and DBS for Training
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder - your training with The Challenge is coming up!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}.
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Your training day for the {!Staffing_Event_Name__c} is just 5 days away! Please read on for important details for your event on {!Staffing_Event_Day__c.Day_date__c}.
What do I need to do?
Please log into the Staffing Website and go to 'Booking Training' section. Here, you will be able to review:
The time and location of the training session. The type of ID documents you will need to bring
Link to Staffing Website: https://staffing.the-challenge.org/Login.aspx?ReturnUrl=%2fsecure%2f
Lunch will be provided; we can offer vegetarian options but unfortunately, we are unable to accommodate other specific dietary requirements. If you have specific dietary requirements please bring your own lunch.
The Challenge is an equal opportunities employer. If you have not already done so, please notify us of any disability or specific that you have that may require reasonable adjustment on our part during the training.
Please ensure that you check for any changes to the training details the night before. These will be updated on the 'Training Booking Details' page no later than a day before the event.
What if I can no longer attend?
Please contact your local staffing team as soon as possible if you are unable to attend the training. We will endeavour to offer you an alternative training date, but unfortunately this may not always be possible.
Best wishes,
The Challenge {!Contact.OwnerFullName} {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c} {!Contact.OwnerPhone}
Email reference: CR 8.2
